long_description:
Yubo is highlighting its socially responsible approach to networking, ensuring a safe and authentic space for users. With millions of users globally, Yubo helps people make genuine friends through chat and live conversations. In a world where social networking can often feel daunting, Yubo stands out as a beacon of authenticity and safety. We believe in being forever young, curious, and unapologetically ourselves. Yubo is more than just an app; it‚Äôs a community where you can express your true colors without being judged‚Äîno likes, no shares, no comparisons‚Äîand expand your mind through meaningful conversations with people from around the globe.

Why Yubo?

- Authentic and Inspiring: At Yubo, we don't shy away from speaking our minds. Our platform is all about showing our true colors and inspiring others to do the same.
- Safe and Secure: Yubo is dedicated to protecting our users‚Äô values, ensuring a safe and respectful environment for everyone.
- Global Connections: Join live streams, participate in multiple conversations, and share your story with people worldwide. It‚Äôs all about connecting, learning, and growing together.
- Forever Young: We believe in staying curious, asking questions, and never losing that sense of wonder. Yubo is a space for young spirits to explore and adapt to new universes.

short_description: Swipewipe is the app that will (finally) help you clean up your camera roll. And you‚Äôll enjoy reminiscing while you do it.
long_description:
Welcome to **Swipewipe** ‚Äî the app that'll (finally) help you clean up your camera roll.

We wanted a simple, fast, elegant solution that let us go month-by-month, work our way through all the photos, videos, screenshots, and everything else in our camera roll, and decide - one by one - what to keep and what to get rid of.

Swipe right to keep a photo, and left to delete it. If you make a mistake,  just tap the current photo to go back.

Our camera rolls shouldn't be such a mess. Scrolling back, you should be able to see the memories you've made without getting interrupted by blurry duplicates, irrelevant screenshots, and other clutter that keeps you from the good stuff.

short_description: Create an engaging and authentic video showcasing how you use the Odysound app throughout your day. Highlight how the app seamlessly integrates into your routine for focus, relaxation, and better sleep.
long_description:
UGC Creator Brief for Meta Ads: Showcase a Day with Odysound

Objective: Create an engaging and authentic video showcasing how you use the Odysound app throughout your day. Highlight how the app seamlessly integrates into your routine for focus, relaxation, and better sleep. The goal is to inspire viewers to see how Odysound can enhance their daily lives.

Video Structure:

	1.	Introduction: Start with a brief introduction, either a voiceover or text, such as ‚ÄúHere‚Äôs how Odysound helps me through my day‚Äù.
	2.	Morning/Work Mode:
	‚Ä¢	Show yourself getting into focus mode for work or studies.
	‚Ä¢	Play one of Odysound‚Äôs focus-enhancing soundscapes.
	‚Ä¢	Example text: ‚ÄúWhen I need to focus, I use [Soundscape Name] to help me stay productive.‚Äù
	3.	Afternoon/Relaxation:
	‚Ä¢	Capture a moment of reading, relaxing, or taking a break.
	‚Ä¢	Highlight a calming soundscape.
	‚Ä¢	Example text: ‚ÄúFor a peaceful reading session, [Soundscape Name] sets the perfect mood.‚Äù
	4.	Evening/Unwinding:
	‚Ä¢	Show how you use Odysound to destress after a long day.
	‚Ä¢	Play a relaxing or meditative soundscape.
	‚Ä¢	Example text: ‚ÄúWhen I need to unwind, [Soundscape Name] helps me reset.‚Äù
	5.	Night/Sleep:
	‚Ä¢	Highlight how you use Odysound‚Äôs timer feature to fall asleep.
	‚Ä¢	Show yourself setting the timer and relaxing in bed.
	‚Ä¢	Example text: ‚ÄúFor a restful night, I use [Soundscape Name] with the sleep timer.‚Äù

Key Points to Include:

	‚Ä¢	Mention the Odysound app by name.
	‚Ä¢	Show the app interface briefly while selecting soundscapes.
	‚Ä¢	Highlight the timer feature for nighttime use.
	‚Ä¢	Use a natural tone‚Äîmake it feel authentic and personal.
	‚Ä¢	Showcase different soundscapes to demonstrate the app‚Äôs versatility.

Additional Notes:

	‚Ä¢	Video Length: Aim for 30-60 seconds (short but impactful).
	‚Ä¢	Orientation: Vertical format (optimized for Meta Ads).
	‚Ä¢	Style: Clean, natural lighting, and relatable moments. Keep it personal and engaging.
	‚Ä¢	Call-to-Action: End with something like ‚ÄúDiscover your perfect soundscape with Odysound‚Äù or ‚ÄúTry Odysound now and elevate your daily routine!‚Äù


Looking forward to seeing your creative routine with¬†Odysound!¬†

short_description: D√©couvrez comment une maman utilise Joko pour g√©rer le budget familial et √©conomiser sur les courses quotidiennes.
long_description:
Hook: "Comment je g√®re mes fins de mois avec un salaire moyen et X enfant(s)?" 
Script:
"Je m'appelle XXX, j'ai XX ans et je suis maman de X enfant"
"Je voulais vous parler d'un sujet important, c'est la gestion du budget. Je vous partage donc quelques astuces dans cette vid√©o"
"Le plus important c'est de connaitre toutes vos charges fixes (loyer, EDF, cr√©dits..), √ßa parait b√™te mais c'est la base."
You write "1. Connaitre ses charges fixes"

"Ensuite, j'utilise le syst√®me des enveloppes pour diviser ce qu'il me reste pour le mois"
We see you showing enveloppes with "Courses", "Shopping", "Cin√© et restaurant" .
You write "2. D√©finir des budgets par cat√©gorie de d√©penses"
You say "400‚Ç¨ de courses, 50‚Ç¨ de shopping et 150‚Ç¨ de loisirs" while you put the banknotes in the enveloppes.

"Pour finir, je cherche des moyens de rentabiliser au maximum les d√©penses r√©currentes comme les courses. Je d√©pense en moyenne 100‚Ç¨ par semaine chez Carrefour et du coup j'ach√®te un bon d'achat sur Joko, c'est une app qui offre du cashback sur les bons d'achat. Pour 400‚Ç¨, je gagne 10‚Ç¨ instantan√©ment sur ma cagnotte, sans rien faire."
We see you facecam at the beginning (while saying the previous sentence).
Once you talk about buying the gift card, we see full screen the app recording when you go on Bon d'achat tab/ click on Carrefour / put 400‚Ç¨

"Partagez en commentaires vos astuces et installez l'appli Joko pour gagner plus de 200‚Ç¨ par an sur vos achats du quotidien"
You show at the same time the screen available in the assets section "outro"

short_description: A mobile app that rewards users for walking.
long_description: WeWard is a mobile app that rewards users for walking. The more you walk the more you accumulate tokens (called the Wards) that you can redeem against rewards (from wiring a transfer on your bank account to making a donation to a charity or buying gifts). Our goal is to fight sedentary lifestyle by making walking a more rewarding part of our lives, and it works: on average our users increase their walking habits by +24% and this behavioral change contributed to reducing CO2 emissions by 600k tons. We can walk our way to a better planet. Our redistributive model enables us to have a societal impact (we have given back 10M$ to users and 600K$ to charities). We are live in 7 European countries, have more than 20M users.

short_description: Break free from the monotony of conventional dating apps. Let Ava, your AI-powered dating app, pave the way for authentic, unposed connections. Let's keep dating 100% real.
long_description:
Ava: We are not a serious dating app, but we take dating seriously af :biting_lip:
Sick of the same old profiles with those same fake perfectly posed pics and zero personality? Conversations starters that feel like a bad tango nobody wants to dance? Swiping right and ending up bored or ghosted after what felt like a decent chat? Yup, double it and give to the next person. We had enough of it :no_entry_sign:
That's why we built Ava.
Ava isn't just another dating app. It's the anti-hero of dating apps. It's for people who want to keep it 100% real and have a blast doing it. With a sprinkle of AI wizardry, your situationships are about to get a whole lot more interesting and way less work.
What Makes Ava Epic:
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Real Vibes Only: Jump into a TikTok-style video feed of actual humans being themselves. No more fake, overdone pics. We're all about the unfiltered, unposed, real-deal you. Take it or leave it, baby :sparkles:
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Flex Your Real Self: Record a selfie vid, pick a background that screams "you," and add your national anthem. Real connections start with real vibes, and this is the bear minimum :pinched_fingers::skin-tone-2:
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Ava, Your AI BFF: Ava's not just any wingwoman. She's your AI-powered, sass-loaded, no-BS, house-breaking sidekick. She'll fetch the real tea on your crushes, homegirl will actually show you them red and green flags before you start chatting with them. we call this matchmaking excellency :saluting_face:
‚Ä¢‚Å†  ‚Å†Flames = Fame: Share your vibe, earn flames, and get noticed. The more you're yourself, the hotter your profile gets. If you're on fire, everyone's gonna know it :heart_on_fire:

short_description: Swipewipe is the app that will (finally) help you clean up your camera roll. And you‚Äôll enjoy reminiscing while you do it.
long_description:
Welcome to **Swipewipe** ‚Äî the app that'll (finally) help you clean up your camera roll.

We wanted a simple, fast, elegant solution that let us go month-by-month, work our way through all the photos, videos, screenshots, and everything else in our camera roll, and decide - one by one - what to keep and what to get rid of.

Swipe right to keep a photo, and left to delete it. If you make a mistake,  just tap the current photo to go back.

Our camera rolls shouldn't be such a mess. Scrolling back, you should be able to see the memories you've made without getting interrupted by blurry duplicates, irrelevant screenshots, and other clutter that keeps you from the good stuff.

short_description: When traditional weight loss methods have failed you, you've tried Hypnozio hypnotherapy and your wellbeing has significantly improved. Sharing your personal story, your struggles with weight loss.
long_description:
1. Start off with a catchy hook, something that will instantly make people stop the scroll. Something relatable around weight loss struggles. Use a pair of two hooks: one to say out loud (for example: ‚ÄúHere‚Äôs my secret to sustainably losing weight in my late 30s‚Äù, ‚ÄúNo one actually wants to go on a restrictive diet and there‚Äôs a better way to lose those pounds) and one text hook that will visible on screen for the duration of the video hook (for example: ‚ÄúTHIS one habit changed my weight loss story‚Äù, ‚Äú95% of people don‚Äôt know THIS about weight loss‚Äù). Here, record yourself speaking to the camera. Sound curious, excited and loud. IMPORTANT: make sure it doesn't come off too negative, insulting or sensitive.
2. Introduce your pain points, what you struggle with the most. Make it feel genuine and relatable to the people on your age group (whether it‚Äôs budgeting, diets, sport/workouts, work, stress, kids, etc.). But again, make sure it‚Äôs not insulting anyone, disrespecting and mocking. Also, please don‚Äôt show any weight loss pictures/videos in the sense of before and after results. Here you can include clips of you feeling stressed while using a computer, sitting down with papers and a calculator, eating a salad and showing a plate of healthy-looking food, playing with your kids or how they won‚Äôt let you sleep on the sofa (if applicable), going on a run or doing home workouts. Then on top of those add a voiceover explaining your story and these struggles that keep you from achieving your weight loss goals. Some lines could be said directly to the camera for a genuine touch. Line examples: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs incredibly challenging to maintain a healthy body image with social media full of supermodels‚Äù, ‚ÄúHealthy weight loss as a mom and on a budget has been hard‚Äù, ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt want to keep myself from eating my favorite foods and I can‚Äôt possibly go on another fad diet hoping for a miracle and then be let down again‚Äù, ‚ÄúWith work stress and kids constantly running around, it‚Äôs challenging to stay midfull and happy about my failed weight loss efforts‚Äù, ‚ÄúI often find comfort in food, when it‚Äôs been a hard day at work, all I want to do is get my favorite takeout but then after it I know I‚Äôd feel guilty for enjoying it.‚Äù 
3. Introduce alternative way for weight loss - hypnotherapy. You can say that a friend or a family member recommended this idea and that you then did your own research on the internet and decided to give it a go. You didn‚Äôt have any high expectations. Here you can sit down and talk in front of the camera or from a selfie angle. Line example: ‚ÄúI was talking to a friend and she mentioned that I should try out self hypnosis sessions. It sounded too good to be true, but I did my own research and decided to give it a go. I didn‚Äôt have anything to lose‚Äù
4. Mention the product Hypnozio, how it helped you in your weight loss journey and how you use it on daily basis. Share your experience and thoughts about the product and how you feel after the sessions, what difference do you notice. Does it make you feel calm and rejuvenated? Do you feel less stressed and more in control of your body? Here include clips of you talking directly to a camera. Then show some clips of you taking a walk in the nature, appreciating it, looking in front of the mirror and smiling, clips of you using your computer calmly, playing with your kids or pets. Please also include a clip of you taking our quiz, showing the process. Over those clips, you can include a voice over with similar lines to: ‚ÄúHypnozio has been an absolute game-changer for me‚Äù, It completely transformed the way I look at my weight loss journey, I‚Äôm more in tune with my body, I‚Äôm more mindfull in my weight loss journey and I actually managed to drop a few pounds and keep them off.‚Äù
5. Mention different features of hypnotherapy and Hypnozio. Talk about that the program is personalized to fit your needs, how the entire process was easy and quick. Mention that you‚Äôve joined a community of many happy women from all around the world that found and swear by hypnotherapy. Mention how it‚Äôs different from diets and workouts, how you can achieve the results from the comfort of your own home, how it‚Äôs only 20 minutes per day. Say how much it changed your wellbeing in just a few months, how you feel more in tune with your body, it‚Äôs cravings and what it needs, how differently you think of food, nutrition and your health. Here add clips of you using Hypnozio: find a nice place around your house (lay on a sofa, bed sit down on a yoga mat in a yoga position), show how you‚Äôre navigating the Hypnozio Member Area, choose a session to listen to, put on your headphones, close your eyes and relax. For some variation, add a clip of you doing this ‚Äúritual‚Äù in your car while you‚Äôre waiting to pick up your kids from school or when you have spare 20 minutes in between your errands to sit back and relax. Over this, please add a voiceover and navigate with your voice what you‚Äôre doing, how you‚Äôre setting up for your daily hypnotherapy session, say the mentions from above. Sound genuine relaxed, happy.
6. Finish with a clear call-to-action. Say that you have a special link through which the viewers can get their own hypnotherapy course for 75% off. Think of something impactful to say to the audience, how your life has changed because of hypnotherapy. Here you can simply sit down and talk in front of the camera or from a selfie angle.

short_description: Objective: Boost engagement with Ro-Karaoke. Promote "Exposing Singers" theme on TikTok. Encourage users to play, share performances with #rokaraoke. Target: Roblox users 13-24. Deliver: 2 posts, 1 live demo. Contact: salencar@stingray.com.
long_description:
Campaign Brief: Ro-Karaoke on Roblox

Objective:
Drive engagement with the Ro-Karaoke game on Roblox.

Narrative:
"Exposing Singers on Ro-Karaoke" - We aim to promote a consistent and compelling story/theme that resonates with our target audience on TikTok. The influencer should sing a bit, praise the game, and demonstrate the feature of muting everyone but one singer. This should be presented in a format similar to this video.

Call to Action:
Encourage followers to download Roblox, play Ro-Karaoke, try the "exposing singers" feature, and share their performances using the trending hashtag #rokaraoke. Ensure the exposure of singers remains positive.

Song:
Do not mention the name of the song; simply sing and comment on it.

Campaign Overview:
We are thrilled to introduce Ro-Karaoke, a new interactive karaoke game on Roblox. Our goal is to engage Roblox users by encouraging them to sing their favorite songs and share their performances with friends. We want to create a vibrant community of music lovers who can express themselves through singing and have fun with our game.

Campaign Objectives:
Drive awareness and excitement about Ro-Karaoke among Roblox users.
Encourage users to play Ro-Karaoke and share their singing experiences.
Build a community of engaged users who regularly interact with the game.

Target Audience:
Roblox users aged 13-24.
Music enthusiasts who enjoy singing and performing.
Users who are active on social media and enjoy sharing content.

Key Messages:
Ro-Karaoke is the ultimate karaoke experience on Roblox.
Sing your favorite songs, challenge your friends, and become a star in the Ro-Karaoke community.
Share your performances and connect with other music lovers on Roblox.
Show off your skills to the world!
Having fun should be part of the narrative!

Content Guidelines:
Create engaging content that showcases the fun and interactive features of Ro-Karaoke.
Highlight your personal experience with the game and what makes it unique.
Encourage your audience to try Ro-Karaoke and share their performances using the hashtag #rokaraoke.

Deliverables:
At least two posts on your main social media platform (e.g., TikTok) featuring Ro-Karaoke.
One live stream or video demonstrating how to use Ro-Karaoke and your favorite features.
Engage with your audience by responding to comments and encouraging them to share their own Ro-Karaoke experiences.

Contact Information:
For any questions or additional information, please contact:
salencar@stingray.com
szangarelli@stingray.com

We are estimating the value of those items or activities to mention on around $100-200 to make it realistic but still very appealing. 

We'd want those materials to be shooted in very common places like it could be inside a car, in the kitchen, in the couch, walking, etc. The idea is the actors act casual and as transparent testimonials to our audience explaining their success with our app.

The videos need to be of a 30 to 45second length, they can't contain swearing and need to be politically correct in all matters.

short_description: A mobile app that rewards users for walking.
long_description: WeWard is a mobile app that rewards users for walking. The more you walk the more you accumulate tokens (called the Wards) that you can redeem against rewards (from wiring a transfer on your bank account to making a donation to a charity or buying gifts). Our goal is to fight sedentary lifestyle by making walking a more rewarding part of our lives, and it works: on average our users increase their walking habits by +24% and this behavioral change contributed to reducing CO2 emissions by 600k tons. We can walk our way to a better planet. Our redistributive model enables us to have a societal impact (we have given back 10M$ to users and 600K$ to charities). We are live in 7 European countries, have more than 20M  users

long_description: SwipeWipe is an app designed to help you quickly and easily clean up your camera roll. short_description: A mobile app that rewards users for walking.
long_description: WeWard is a mobile app that rewards users for walking. The more you walk the more you accumulate tokens (called the Wards) that you can redeem against rewards (from wiring a transfer on your bank account to making a donation to a charity or buying gifts). Our goal is to fight sedentary lifestyle by making walking a more rewarding part of our lives, and it works: on average our users increase their walking habits by +24% and this behavioral change contributed to reducing CO2 emissions by 600k tons. We can walk our way to a better planet. Our redistributive model enables us to have a societal impact (we have given back 10M$ to users and 600K$ to charities). We are live in 7 European countries, have more than 20M  users.

short_description: This campaign is a call to action for anyone looking to transform their health habits, emphasizing the power of support and tailored fitness plans in making exercise a consistent part of life.
long_description:
In the campaign, we delve deep into the personal fitness stories that resonate with our audience's struggles and aspirations. Through a detailed narrative, a content creator, fresh from their workout session, brings us into their world, highlighting the challenges they faced before discovering Athena. They speak candidly about the hurdles of starting and maintaining a fitness routine, the overwhelming world of workout planning, and the loneliness that can accompany the journey towards health.

As the story unfolds, Athena emerges as more than just an app‚Äîit becomes a catalyst for change. The creator details how Athena's structured communities offered not just workout plans, but a foundation of knowledge, motivation, and support. They emphasize the critical role of Athena‚Äôs motivational feed, filled with stories of perseverance and success, which provided daily doses of inspiration.

The narrative then shifts to the essence of Athena: its ability to foster connections. The creator shares personal anecdotes of encouragement received, friendships formed, and the sense of belonging within the Athena community. They highlight how this support network was instrumental in their journey, not just for reaching fitness goals but in cultivating a sustainable and enjoyable wellness lifestyle.

By combining personal testimony with engaging visuals of their journey and interactions within Athena, the campaign paints a picture of transformation that‚Äôs attainable for viewers. It calls on viewers to envision themselves as part of a community that‚Äôs rooting for their success, armed with the tools and support to make fitness a rewarding part of their lives. short_description: "Verdien' an deinem Alltag" lautet das Motto von Sunrise. Unsere Fonds enthalten viele Unternehmen, die im Alltag oft eine Rolle spielen: Modeh√§user, Hotelketten, Schokoladenhersteller, Windelproduzenten, Fastfoodketten, Banken oder Waschmittelhersteller.
long_description:
Unser Ziel ist es, das Anlegen von Kapital f√ºr jeden zug√§nglich zu machen, unabh√§ngig vom Alter und Kenntnisstand. Ab 10 Euro monatlich kann in diesen Fonds-Sparplan eingezahlt werden. Die Kosten liegen bei unter einem Prozent pro Jahr ‚Äì es gibt keine versteckten Geb√ºhren oder b√∂se √úberraschungen. Ein Ein- oder Ausstieg ist jederzeit m√∂glich. Wer eine Pause beim Einzahlen einlegen will, kann auch das tun.

Weil Unternehmen all die Dinge verkaufen, die wir zum Leben brauchen, haben diese mit uns eine verl√§ssliche Einnahmequelle: Genau wie Herr Porsche daran verdient, wenn jemand einen Porsche kauft, verdient jemand √ºber Sunrise, sobald irgendwer eines der Produkte kauft, die im Fonds enthalten sind. 

Unsere Idee ist es, dass Jeder zus√§tzlich zu seiner Arbeitskraft die M√∂glichkeit haben soll, ein zweites Standbein aufzubauen. √úber die Sunrise App zeigen wir den Anlegern ihr Investment und die Wertentwicklung ihres Depots. √úber die App kann auch der monatliche Sparbetrag jederzeit ver√§ndert oder bei Bedarf auch pausiert werden. Zudem werden laufend Nachrichten zu den Unternehmen im Fonds publiziert, sodass der Anleger jederzeit auf dem neusten Stand ist.

short_description: To create ad video to promote the value of Yubo : "Yubo is a platform that helps you make friend confidently. Believe in yourself when being friend with your tribe on Yubo". The ultimate objective is to have user download the app
long_description:
Yubo is highlighting its socially responsible approach to networking, ensuring a safe and authentic space for users. With millions of users globally, Yubo helps people make genuine friends through chat and live conversations. In a world where social networking can often feel daunting, Yubo stands out as a beacon of authenticity and safety. We believe in being forever young, curious, and unapologetically ourselves. Yubo is more than just an app; it‚Äôs a community where you can express your true colors without being judged‚Äîno likes, no shares, no comparisons‚Äîand expand your mind through meaningful conversations with people from around the globe.

Why Yubo?

- Authentic and Inspiring: At Yubo, we don't shy away from speaking our minds. Our platform is all about showing our true colors and inspiring others to do the same.
- Safe and Secure: Yubo is dedicated to protecting our users‚Äô values, ensuring a safe and respectful environment for everyone.
- Global Connections: Join live streams, participate in multiple conversations, and share your story with people worldwide. It‚Äôs all about connecting, learning, and growing together.
- Forever Young: We believe in staying curious, asking questions, and never losing that sense of wonder. Yubo is a space for young spirits to explore and adapt to new universes.

short_description: A mobile app that rewards users for walking.
long_description: WeWard is a mobile app that rewards users for walking. The more you walk the more you accumulate tokens (called the Wards) that you can redeem against rewards (from wiring a transfer on your bank account to making a donation to a charity or buying gifts). Our goal is to fight sedentary lifestyle by making walking a more rewarding part of our lives, and it works: on average our users increase their walking habits by +24% and this behavioral change contributed to reducing CO2 emissions by 600k tons. We can walk our way to a better planet. Our redistributive model enables us to have a societal impact (we have given back 10M$ to users and 600K$ to charities). We are live in 7 European countries, have more than 20M users.

short_description: Please try to reproduce this kind of video using the provided script below: https://drive.google.com/file/d/18xaGWGdFAh-tADCt7EQGMCVIBumSZ77S/view?usp=sharing
long_description:
Please try to reproduce this kind of video using the provided script below: https://drive.google.com/file/d/18xaGWGdFAh-tADCt7EQGMCVIBumSZ77S/view?usp=sharing. Note that the reference video is 17s but we need a longer video (+30s).

Script

I'm going to show you the game I'm hooked on
This game is so nostalgic, it reminds me to old Oregon Trail...but this new game is called Oregon Trail Boom Town!
I had read about this game and I love games to build cities, farms, etc.
But downloading it I saw that it was much more than that.
Yes, it's free ;)
There are so many things to do, build, collect...is just a lot of fun!
In this game you can grow different foods, help your friends, provide the necessary and different items so that the cars can advance to Oregon...
Play mini-games to get money, barter (boats), feed the animals...as you progress you can get more incredible buildings, more land and build an incredible city to your liking.
I'm starting to build cool buildings and fances..:)
Let me show you my town!

Ops! I think someone needs help! 

Let me help her build a hospital and we continue:)

Ok, look now my corns, woods, and all the things i can plant..

Oh and look my animals, they are super happy!
I usually play it before going to sleep as a habit, it makes me disconnect and I prepare things for the next day to be able to pick them up, so for me it is very satisfying.
So I recommend it one hundred percent! Enjoy!

short_description: Pocket Champs is an engaging multiplayer idle game that centers around strategic training in running, flying, or climbing to prepare your Champ for global competition.
long_description:
Pocket Champs is an engaging multiplayer idle game that centers around strategic training in running, flying, or climbing to prepare your Champ for global competition. The objective is to outperform other players and claim the crown. Players can enhance their Champs' performance by choosing the right gadgets, such as running shoes, fins, or a pick, each providing a unique advantage in the race. Legendary gadgets like the Eagle or the Cheetah can be unlocked through daily chest openings.
The game offers time-limited events featuring intense races against numerous opponents, adding an element of excitement. While striving for first place, players must navigate challenges and unexpected dangers that can disrupt their race strategy. long_description:
Welcome to **Swipewipe** ‚Äî the app that'll (finally) help you clean up your camera roll.

We wanted a simple, fast, elegant solution that let us go month-by-month, work our way through all the photos, videos, screenshots, and everything else in our camera roll, and decide - one by one - what to keep and what to get rid of.

Swipe right to keep a photo, and left to delete it. If you make a mistake,  just tap the current photo to go back.

Our camera rolls shouldn't be such a mess. Scrolling back, you should be able to see the memories you've made without getting interrupted by blurry duplicates, irrelevant screenshots, and other clutter that keeps you from the good stuff.

short_description: Boyfriend helps girlfriend harvest.
long_description:
Please, find full brief here: https://app.milanote.com/1RCOXY1BsMYY9R/ramdam?p=HRkc8lhvCoE
Script:
My girlfriend's barn is full and she can't harvest any more crops. That's because she hasn't yet sent all the collected items to Oregon's wagons, or to the ships! I'm going to help her.

In order to empty the barn in the first levels you must send all the food and products to the carts so that they can reach Oregon, and fill the boxes on the ships so that they can bring you new materials.

Furthermore, if you want to have a larger barn, you will have to build more homes and buildings so that many neighbors want to live in your city, and you can have bigger buildings, and a better barn!

I'm going to show you my game, I'm at a very high level! My town is beautiful, full of fountains, fences, roads...

I also have many animals, mind you, including otters!

My pigs are also happy with the city.

Oops! The sheep have left my farm, we are going to return them to their place immediately.

As you can see, I have built magnificent buildings and a lot of people live in my city.

Try it too and download Oregon Trail Boom Town to create the city of your dreams.

short_description: Get more work from Upwork with PouncerAI; a faster way to apply for freelancing gigs on Upwork
long_description:
PouncerAI is revolutionizing the way freelancers apply for freelancing jobs on Upwork. By using our Chrome Extension, freelancers can generate detailed, persuasive cover letter proposals in no time. 

Through our campaign, we aim to relieve the stress of applying for freelancing jobs by making the process faster and more effective, increasing the chances of being hired.

BACKGROUND
Millions of freelancers apply for projects on Upwork by creating cover letter proposals for job postings. Today, most freelancers manually write a proposal or copy/paste from swipe files and/or ChatGPT.

With PouncerAI, a freelancer just needs to click the Generate button on the application page and PouncerAi creates a highly tailored cover letter proposal that combines the job information with the freelancers background to generate a unique cover letter.

Unlike ChatGPT, the cover letters created by PouncerAI sound "natural" and use proven copywriting frameworks that will grab a client's attention.

So instead of spending 20 minutes creating a cover letter, a freelancer spend less than 20 seconds getting work.

product_name: Yubo: Make friends in your way
short_description: To create ad video to promote the value of Yubo : "Yubo is a platform that helps you make friend confidently. believe in yourself when being friend with your tribe on Yubo". The ultimate objective is to have user download the app
long_description:
This is an awesome campaign because Yubo is highlighting its socially responsible approach to networking, ensuring a safe and authentic space for users. With millions of users globally, Yubo helps people make genuine friends through chat and live conversations. In a world where social networking can often feel daunting, Yubo stands out as a beacon of authenticity and safety. We believe in being forever young, curious, and unapologetically ourselves. Yubo is more than just an app; it‚Äôs a community where you can express your true colors without being judged‚Äîno likes, no shares, no comparisons‚Äîand expand your mind through meaningful conversations with people from around the globe.

Why Yubo?

- Authentic and Inspiring: At Yubo, we don't shy away from speaking our minds. Our platform is all about showing our true colors and inspiring others to do the same.
- Safe and Secure: Yubo is dedicated to protecting our users‚Äô values, ensuring a safe and respectful environment for everyone.
- Global Connections: Join live streams, participate in multiple conversations, and share your story with people worldwide. It‚Äôs all about connecting, learning, and growing together.
- Forever Young: We believe in staying curious, asking questions, and never losing that sense of wonder. Yubo is a space for young spirits to explore and adapt to new universes.

short_description: We want to find new users for our match-3 game Jelly Juice. The main target audience is female 45+ (mainly mums, grandmother, who are working from home, have time to play).
long_description:
The objective of the campaign is to get new users to download the app Jelly Juice

Jelly Juice is a match-3 game inspired by the famous Candy Crush and Royal Match.
The game is free to play, and the main difference with other games is that there are no ads to disturb the user experience.
Users love the development of the game, with rooms decoration and furnishing.
The game can also be played offline, and this make it even more loved because people can play in the subway, on a flight, or without using phone data.

Our main audience is currently a female adult audience (women, 45+), mainly housewives that are at home and have a lot of time to play.

This is a real review from one of our users:
"Just love jelly juice. Very addictive! Still playing everyday! Love the garden plants and seeds! Still 5 :star2:. Still addicted on level 5000+. and still addicted!! Love the Space station!!!! At 80 years old and still playing. Can't stop!!! Please can we have more rooms to decorate! Absolutely hooked on Jelly Juice!!!!! LOVE IT!!"

short_description: Feels is an anti-dating app with profiles based on videos/photos/prompts in an attempt to get people to connect on a more personal level.
long_description:
The entire experience on Feels is made to allow user to easily grasp the other users personality, almost like if they were meeting them in real life. Hence our moto: real people, real vibes. 

The interaction system is also very unique as you can react (it is called a Feels) to something specific in someone‚Äôs profile and add a DM (called a SuperFeels) to try to directly launch the conversation, avoiding the boring ‚Äúhey, what‚Äôs up?‚Äù.

You also have the ability to choose your intentions (called ‚Äúvibe‚Äù in the app): bff=friends, spicy=hook up, serious=relationship, chill=see what happens, and filter by the kind of relationship type you are looking for. 
We pride ourselves in the comfortable and chill environment the Feels App creates, in comparison to other dating/ relationship apps.

short_description: Make a video inspired in that two references below with a person recording themselves on his house (LIKE A SELFIE VIEW)  talking about OREGON TRAIL BOOM TOWN and showing gameplay.
long_description:
Make a video inspired in that two references below with a person recording themselves on his house (LIKE A SELFIE VIEW)  talking about OREGON TRAIL BOOM TOWN and showing gameplay. Please note that we will add the gameplay in post-production, so we only need you to record yourself. Follow the script below. Add texts. Full idea and references here: https://app.milanote.com/1RB0vV1Tvt1b0d?p=pxlodgsEboi

Script:

I'm going to show you my favourite cozy game!

The game is called Oregon Trail Boom Town.

I had read about this game and I love games to build cities, farms, etc.

But downloading it I saw that it was much more than that.

Yes, it's free ;)


There are so many things to do, build, collect...is just a lot of fun!

In this game you can grow different foods, help your friends, provide the necessary and different items so that the cars can advance to Oregon...

Play mini-games to get money, barter (boats), feed the animals...as you progress you can get more incredible buildings, more land and build an incredible city to your liking.

I'm starting to build cool buildings and fances..:)

I think it's a cozy game because I don't like to be frustrated when I'm playing a game and little by little you can achieve more things and it is not a stressful game.
I usually play it before going to sleep as a habit, it makes me disconnect and I prepare things for the next day to be able to pick them up, so for me it is very satisfying.

So I recommend it one hundred percent! Enjoy!

short_description: Join Minglefair's local connection revolution! Rediscover the joy of face-to-face interactions, celebrate community, and forge lasting bonds. With diverse activities and welcoming spaces, let's make memories and embrace genuine connections.
long_description:
In a world where digital connections often overshadow face-to-face interactions, Minglefair is leading a revolution ‚Äì one that champions the power of genuine, local connections. Our campaign is more than just a call to action; it's a rallying cry for communities everywhere to come together, share experiences, and forge bonds that transcend the digital realm.

With Minglefair, we're redefining socializing. Gone are the days of superficial interactions and fleeting conversations. Instead, we're embracing the authenticity of real-life connections ‚Äì the kind that leave a lasting impact and create memories to cherish.

Throughout the campaign, we'll be showcasing the diverse range of opportunities available on Minglefair. From outdoor adventures to cultural explorations, there's something for everyone. Whether you're a seasoned social butterfly or someone looking to step out of their comfort zone, Minglefair offers a welcoming space where you can meet like-minded individuals and discover new passions.

But our campaign isn't just about the activities ‚Äì it's about the people. We'll be shining a spotlight on the incredible stories and connections that have been forged through Minglefair. From lifelong friendships to unexpected encounters, every interaction has the potential to spark something magical.

So join us as we embark on this journey to embrace the local connection revolution. Together, let's rediscover the joy of face-to-face interactions, celebrate the richness of our communities, and build a world where genuine connections thrive. Get ready to make memories, forge friendships, and experience the magic of Minglefair.

In The Sandbox, people can also buy, sell, and trade digital land and items through a special marketplace. The platform is run by its community, which means that the people who use it have a say in how it operates. It has its own digital currency, called SAND, which is used for buying and selling things within the system, as well as making decisions about how the platform is run.

The Sandbox is not a virtual or augmented reality experience, but rather a program that runs on your desktop computer. In the future, it plans to expand to other devices and platforms.

short_description: GS is an inclusive fitness tracker for sustainable living, making exercise accessible to all with personalized guidance. Learn more on the App Store. We won an Apple Design Award 2024 and App of the Year 2022.
long_description:
Gentler Streak is an inclusive health and fitness tracker designed to promote a sustainable approach to an active lifestyle. Our mission is to make the benefits of regular exercise accessible to everyone. By providing personalized guidance tailored to support individual capabilities and well-being, Gentler Streak ensures that users of all fitness levels and backgrounds feel welcomed and supported in their fitness journey.
Please read more aboout our app on the App Store.
We‚Äôd like to emphasize winning our Apple Design Award in june (we also got App of the year award in 2022) with this video. Here are some guidelines:
- Demonstrate the app appropriately on the watch and also show the phone app.
- The creator must be shown engaging in some sort of activity, wearing sports attire (doesn‚Äôt have to be super professional, but still believable).
- Show the creator‚Äôs face and perhaps some talking to the camera to make it more real and relatable.
- Ensure enough of the app is shown.
- It‚Äôs ideal if the creators are already somewhat active so that their health data is populated with activity information. This way, GS can immediately take and display the data in the app.
- Add captions + some nice music+ call to
Here are some scenarios for your help, the text in the brackets serve as some hints for what to show. Of course, it‚Äôs not necessary for them to follow the text word for word, but you should capture the tone and message well.
V1:
My favorite fitness tracker just won the Apple Design Award aka the Oscar of the app world! I first heard about this app when it got the Apple Watch App of the Year award and have stuck with it ever since. I love how motivating and compassionate it is (SHOW A KIND NOTIFICATION OR INAPP STATUS ON THE PHONE APP). It tracks over 140 activities (SHOW THE ACTIVITIES ON THE WATCH), so I can use it every day, whether I feel like running or just going for a walk. Not to mention, it suggests rest days! ( SHOW GO GENTLER OR PICK A REST DAY) But my favorite thing is the user-friendly interface that makes it easy to use and understand my fitness metrics and my body‚Äôsneeds (SHOW IPHONE APP, TAP THROUGH SOME METRICS/ TABS). If you have an Apple Watch, you must download this from the App Store now!

It‚Äôs made for everyone, no matter your age or fitness level.
It lets you track over 140 activities, including dog walking, daily chores, and gardening. (SHOW THE ACTIVITIES ON THE WATCH),
It motivates you with kind and uplifting messages! (SHOW AFTER WORKOUT NOTIFICATION ON YOUR WATCH/ OR A GOOD STREAK STATUS)
It puts your well-being first by finding the perfect balance between fitness and rest. (SHOW GO GENTLER)
It looks fantastic and is super user-friendly - and that‚Äôs why Apple just awarded it this big recognition! (SHOW IPHONE APP-METRICKS)
Download and try it for yourself!
V3:
Gentler Streak just won the Apple Design Award, considered the Oscar of the app world!
If you are still looking for a useful and user-friendly app, this might be your sign. (SHOW THE STREAK TAB) Gentler Streak is a sustainable fitness tracker that promotes a compassionate approach to exercise, where rest is as important as intensity. (GO GENTLER/ YOU CAN PICK A REST DAY) It responds to your readiness, proposes daily workout actions, and allows you to track over 140 workout types, including daily chores and dog walking. (SHOW WORKOUT TYPES ON THE WATCH) Most importantly, it makes your post-workout data super easy to read and understand. ( SHOW THE APP ON THE IPHONE, SHOW THE METRICS,...) No wonder it was just awarded by Apple. Download it from the App Store, and thank me later!
V4:
My go-to fitness app, Gentler Streak, just won the Apple Design Award, often called the Oscar of the app world! I started using it after it was named Apple Watch App of the Year, and I‚Äôve been hooked ever since. What sets it apart for me? It tracks over 140 activities (SHOW THE ACTIVITIES ON THE WATCH) and sends me encouraging notifications that keep me motivated. (SHOW A KIND NOTIFICATION OR IN-APP STATUS ON YOUR IPHONE) Plus, it balances fitness with rest days, ensuring I never overdo it. (SHOW GO GENTLER OR PICK A REST DAY) The app‚Äôs user-friendly interface makes it simple to monitor my fitness metrics and understand my body‚Äôs needs. (SHOW IPHONE APP) If you‚Äôre an Apple Watch user, this is a must-have app. Download it from the App Store today!
V5:
Have an Apple Watch? Let me tell you why Gentler Streak, the recent winner of the Apple Design Award (the Oscar of the app world!), should be your next download!
It tracks over 140 activities, from running to gardening, making it versatile for any lifestyle. (SHOW ACTIVITIES ON THE WATCH) It sends kind and uplifting messages that keep me motivated throughout my fitness journey. (SHOW AFTER WORKOUT NOTIFICATION OR A GOOD STREAK STATUS)
It ensures I maintain a healthy balance between exercise and rest, preventing burnout. (SHOW GO GENTLER OR PICK A REST DAY) The app‚Äôs design is stunning and incredibly user-friendly, making it easy to navigate and understand my fitness data. (SHOW IPHONE APP)
And the best part? With its gentler and thoughtful approach, it will help you stay motivated and consistent with your workouts, just as you‚Äôve always wished. Download Gentler Streak from the App Store‚Äîit‚Äôs free!

short_description: Explain how to earn money thanks to Joko, like an app review / product presentation.
long_description:
Concept

- Retake the style of the inspirational video (cf Assets section)

- Environment: film yourself with green background so that you can add the screen scrolling after
- Style: FaceCam
- Zones: make sure you respect safe zones for the texts (text not too at the bottom of the video)


Script
Please as long as you consider you could improve the sentence (in native american/english) do it. You can get inspiration of what has been done by the other creator to adapt the sentences (but keep in mind you should keep the order and the main idea).

- Hook: keep the same "I discovered a new app that helps you saving money".
Background: video of the Joko store page, we can see title and subtile + a part of the screenshots.
"Ohhhhh, I cannot believe Joko is offering this feature". Background: you show the merchants list.

Transition you step back and you start to explain what the app is about
"This app offers cashback, honestly it's like saving money without doing anything".
Background: you show your cagnotte balance screen scrolling with tons of cashbacks.
"The Joko app has more than 2 500 brands including all my favourite ones, this is so cool".

Background: you show app record scrolling the list of merchants.
"This app should be kept top secret".

short_description: Discover new beauty products every month with Box Blissim. Unbox, explore, and enjoy curated beauty experiences delivered at your door.
long_description: With Box Blissim, beauty exploration is just a click away. Our campaign aims to highlight the convenience and thrill of the service. We will focus on the excitement of unboxing, the novelty in trying out a range of quality beauty products delivered to your door, and the value of the service in terms of time and cost. Viewers will get a sense of the diverse range of products included in each box - skincare, makeup, haircare, and more from well-established and emerging brands.

product_name: Yubo: Make friends in your way
short_description: Yubo is a social platform aimed at helping users make new friends all around the world.
long_description: Yubo is highlighting its socially responsible approach to networking, ensuring a safe and authentic space for users. With millions of users globally, Yubo helps people make genuine friends through chat and live conversations. In a world where social networking can often feel daunting, Yubo stands out as a beacon of authenticity and safety. We believe in being forever young, curious, and unapologetically ourselves. Yubo is more than just an app; it‚Äôs a community where you can express your true colors without being judged‚Äîno likes, no shares, no comparisons‚Äîand expand your mind through meaningful conversations with people from around the globe.

short_description: Revive your BeReal experience with our dual-camera video sharing! Rediscover, share more moments, and connect differently with friends.
long_description: The campaign aims to promote BeReal, a unique mobile app that lets users capture and share videos using both front and back camera. This feature adds a whole new dimension to video sharing, allowing users to capture split-view moments for increased entertainment. We‚Äôre encouraging our previous users to rediscover BeReal and enjoy the benefits of the newly integrated features which we believe will enrich their experiences and enable them to share even more delightful moments with friends.

short_description: Become a wizard and embark on an RPG adventure in the magical world of Wizard Universe - Magic Games. Master spells, craft potions and experience epic battles!
long_description: Wizard Universe - Magic Games invites you to a mystical world of wizardry and RPG adventure. Within this game, you'll get to become a true wizard, mastering the art of spell casting, potion crafting and mystical creature battling. Immerse yourself in the magical world, uncovering its secrets, and experiencing the fun of multiplayer game with friends. The campaign showcases the journey of becoming a Wizard Legend, demonstrating the fun of character customization, intense thrill of epic battles, and the adventure of mystery-solving in this magic-filled world.

short_description: Rediscover the joy of dating with Smitten! We're all about fun, celebrating the single life, and making dating enjoyable. Join us and celebrate singledom!
long_description: Experience a whole new side of dating with Smitten ‚Äì the dating app that's all about fun! We celebrate the joy of single life and make your dating journey easy and enjoyable. We've got a big dose of entertainment mixed with flirting, chatting, and embracing your unique dating journey. Single life should be celebrated, not pressurized into finding 'the one'. So get smitten with Smitten and rediscover the fun side of dating!

product_name: Be Fit: Gym & At Home Workouts
short_description: Enhance your fitness journey with Be Fit, an app offering structured workouts and customization to cater to your fitness goals. Easy to use and affordable, it's your go-to app for a personalized fitness route.
long_description:
We're launching a new fitness app, Be Fit: Gym & At Home Workouts, designed with a women-centric approach. With Be Fit, we are offering a wide array of workouts categorized based on fitness level, muscle groups, and seasonal needs. The app is designed with simplicity and flexibility in mind. You can follow our pre-scheduled training plans, available both weekly and monthly, or set up your own plan. Affordable and reliable, our app stands out in its ability to offer a personalized fitness journey.

We need the creator to show the app functionality, best case is if the creator shows themselves using the app and exercising at home or at the gym.

short_description: Experience task management like never before with VoiceTasker! Set reminders smoothly using voice commands. Innovation and convenience in the palm of your hand.
long_description: The ad campaign seeks to promote VoiceTasker ‚Äì a revolutionary app that enables users to manage tasks using voice commands. The aim is to raise awareness, attract a broad audience, generate leads before it goes live. The campaign will highlight its simple yet effective function that sets it apart: the ability to set reminders intuitively with voice, setting new trends in task management.
